items.sentence: What\'s the difference between a hedgehog and a porcupine?
Why didn\'t you tell me that you were allergic to peanuts?
I\'m looking for Tom. You don\'t know where he is, do you?
I\'m not sure if I\'m going to be able to be of much help.
Are you honestly telling me you never want to get married?
How long has it been since you received a letter from him?
I think we need to find out who Tom plans to give that to.
This application runs on Tom\'s phone, but not on Mary\'s.
Was this wall built to keep people out or to keep them in?
We have to do something to stop this from happening again.
Tom asked me why I never tried to get a driver\'s license.
Tom broke into Mary\'s house and stole her pearl necklace.
Tom and Mary fell head over heels in love with each other.
Tom and Mary have been happily married for thirteen years.
Tom and Mary split up after being married for three years.
I thought I\'d drop in to see you before I went to Boston.
I understand your point of view, but don\'t agree with it.
I wouldn\'t want to do anything that would make Tom angry.
Although there\'s little chance of success, let\'s try it.
Don\'t hesitate to ask questions if you don\'t understand.
